properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) PCOUNT FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM (SELECT PRODUCT_NO , PRODUCT_NAME , PRICE , DELETE_STATUS , P.CATEGORY_NO , P.USER_NO , P.REGION_NO FROM PRODUCT P JOIN CATEGORY C ON (P.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO) JOIN USER_INFO U ON (P.USER_NO = U.USER_NO) WHERE P.PRODUCT_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
